first_translate: it’s as if  god himself has unleashed his wrath upon us.
this is my first time seeing such skill from a magician.
if anything,  I’d say that I’ll become the final boss one day.
because your ego will probably get the best of you soon enough.

hangle: 설마 이 정도로는 부족하다고 여기서 던지려는 건 아니지?!
first_translate: d-don’t tell me he thinks this isn’t good enough! does he plan on throwing more at us?!
